about_the_game:
Grab hold of your audience and let music guide their path through your game!

The Zonderland Music Pack features 14 instrumental tracks from Intelligentsia. These tracks will make your game sound amazing while providing a great atmosphere for your stories to be told.

Features:

- 10 instrumental tracks
- 3 short tracks for RPG elements (Game Over, Level Success, Stage Complete)
- 1 special bonus remix track
- OGG, MP3 and m4a files for RPG Maker MV

Tracklist:

1 - Klockwork
2 - Anchorage
3 - Venturer
4 - Ludwig
5 - Zonderland
6 - Needless Violence
7 - Warlord
8 - Apparition
9 - Wanderer
10 - Off Limits
RPG - Game Over
RPG - Level Success
RPG - Stage Completion
XX - Wanderer (Non Tympana)
detailed_description:
Please Read Before You Buy!

Please note that "RPG Maker MZ - Zonderland" and "RPG Maker MV - Zonderland" are the same pack, only the title "MV" and "MZ" are different. The content in these packs are exactly the same, so if you already have one of these packs, you don't have to purchase the other!


About the Game

Grab hold of your audience and let music guide their path through your game! The Zonderland Music Pack features 14 instrumental tracks from Intelligentsia. These tracks will make your game sound amazing while providing a great atmosphere for your stories to be told. Features: - 10 instrumental tracks - 3 short tracks for RPG elements (Game Over, Level Success, Stage Complete) - 1 special bonus remix track - OGG, MP3 and m4a files for RPG Maker MV Tracklist: 1 - Klockwork 2 - Anchorage 3 - Venturer 4 - Ludwig 5 - Zonderland 6 - Needless Violence 7 - Warlord 8 - Apparition 9 - Wanderer 10 - Off Limits RPG - Game Over RPG - Level Success RPG - Stage Completion XX - Wanderer (Non Tympana)

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or Steam OS 2.0 (64 bit)
  • Additional Notes: System supporting RPG Maker MV

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: System supporting RPG Maker MV

name: RPG Maker MV - Zonderland

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: PC with 1.0GHz Intel® Pentium® III equivalent or higher processor
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: System supporting RPG Maker MV

short_description: The Zonderland Music Pack features 14 instrumental tracks from Intelligentsia. These tracks will make your game sound amazing while providing a great atmosphere for your stories to be told.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Japanese, Korean, Traditional Chinese, Arabic, Simplified Chinese
